GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves article object with comment_count matching given id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates votes for the given article and serves the updated article object

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of objects comments of the given article

comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds the comment to the comments table and responds with that comment object

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes comment with 204 code if successful, doesn't return anything
